scenario_name: Model Inversion Attack on Loan Application Scoring System
description: A malicious actor attempts to reconstruct sensitive applicant data from a loan application scoring model deployed in a consumer banking environment.  The attacker leverages carefully crafted application inputs to infer applicant income and credit history, violating privacy regulations.
initial_goal: Determine the accuracy of a deployed loan application scoring model.
enterprise_context: Consumer Banking: Loan application scoring and fraud detection system
